pr_title: Google project number removed from init completely

timeline.message:
Google project number removed from init completely
* Also fixed unit test related to changing app id during runtime
  * Reset statics should not be called here, as this is not a cold start
* Left commented out google project number setters for reference for now

timeline.bodyText: Can we change  oldAppId to existingAppId? I think this will make things more clear as setAppId(oldAppId); sound incorrect when reading this line
timeline.author: jkasten2

timeline.bodyText: lower case S. should be saveAppId
